Params: {2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'A friendly reminder from Korolev: Dear children, please treat public facilities with love and care—'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Serious offenders will be separated from their parents for one week in correctional facilities.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You sure a child can climb up here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't pay attention to the broadcast, Liv.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yeah, the observation cabin of the space station has been destroyed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Miss Celica? How did you manage to contact us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'We just... launched... a relay satellite, trying to... establish... more... communications...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Right, I wanted... to tell you... Thanks to you, the observation deck... was destroyed...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "The accuracy of... space station's beyond-visual-range attack... is rapidly dropping...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'You can... continue... with your original... mission...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Even after we removed their long-range attacks, there is still a lot of close-quarter firepower...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We better stick to the plan and get rid of their defense system. Only then can we establish stable communications to help the subsequent main force to land.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Um... These compartments have been constantly moving. I need to compare them again...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'A friendly reminder from Korolev: To visit the next compartment, please follow the green arrows on the corridor—'}
{3: 'Green arrows start to light up along the corridor.'}
